burlap.domain.singleagent.lunarlander

Class LLVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.domain.singleagent.lunarlander.LLVisualizer

  • public class LLVisualizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating a 2D visualizer for a LunarLanderDomain Domain. The agent is rendered as a red rectangle, obstacles as black rectangles, and the goal landing pad a blue rectangle. The agent's rectangle will be rotated according to the agent/ship's orientation.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LLVisualizer.AgentPainter
      Object painter for a lunar lander agent class.
      static class  LLVisualizer.ObstaclePainter
      Object painter for obstacles of a lunar lander domain, rendered as black rectangles.
      static class  LLVisualizer.PadPainter
      Object painter for landing pads of a lunar lander domain, rendered as blue rectangles.

      Constructor and Description
      LLVisualizer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StateRenderLayer getStateRenderLayer(LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams physParams)
      Returns a StateRenderLayer a the LunarLanderDomain using the provided LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams to define the visualized movement space and rotation degrees.
      static Visualizer getVisualizer(LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams physParams)
      Returns a Visualizer a the LunarLanderDomain using the provided LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams to define the visualized movement space and rotation degrees.
      static Visualizer getVisualizer(LunarLanderDomain lld)
      Returns a Visualizer for a LunarLanderDomain using the generator's current version of the physics parameters for defining the visualized movement space size and rotation degrees.

    • Method Detail

      • getVisualizer

        public static Visualizer getVisualizer(LunarLanderDomain lld)
        Returns a Visualizer for a LunarLanderDomain using the generator's current version of the physics parameters for defining the visualized movement space size and rotation degrees.
        Parameters:
        lld - the specific lunar lander domain generator to visualize
        Returns:
        a Visualizer for the LunarLanderDomain

      • getVisualizer

        public static Visualizer getVisualizer(LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams physParams)
        Returns a Visualizer a the LunarLanderDomain using the provided LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams to define the visualized movement space and rotation degrees.
        Parameters:
        physParams - the LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams specifying the visualized movement space of the domain and the rotation degrees
        Returns:
        a Visualizer for the LunarLanderDomain

      • getStateRenderLayer

        public static StateRenderLayer getStateRenderLayer(LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams physParams)
        Returns a StateRenderLayer a the LunarLanderDomain using the provided LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams to define the visualized movement space and rotation degrees.
        Parameters:
        physParams - the LunarLanderDomain.LLPhysicsParams specifying the visualized movement space of the domain and the rotation degrees
        Returns:
        a StateRenderLayer for the LunarLanderDomain
